HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: We make sure say your sensitive information dey well protected. All data dey encrypted for client-side. We no sabi your IP address, wetin you dey share, or who you dey share di secret links with - and most important, di content.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Na you alone dey sabi di link to di secret information wey you create and who you dey share am with. When you dey create secret, you fit add password before e go fit unlock. E dey possible too to set burner-time. No matter wetin, secret go delete after 14 days.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: All links and content dey hashed for client-side, meaning even we no sabi di link and di content. Every link get unique ID of 36 length which na one-way encryption to fit access di Secret Message and di content wey encrypted with AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Write your message and/or generate password
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Write and send message, e go be
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Write your Secret message, password or sensitive information *

When you dey create secret, you fit add password before e go fit unlock. E dey possible too to set burner-time. No matter wetin, secret go delete after 14 days.

CONFIRMATION.SECRET_UNAVAILABLE_TEXT: E no go dey available again

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hi, you don receive one secret message!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Write and send message, e go delete once read.
VIEW.SHOW_MESSAGE_ONCE: Di following message go show only once
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Download Stellar Secret for mobile, create your secret messages
